# Traitors
[color=#999999][italic]"WHISKEY. ECHO. WHISKEY. LIMA. ALPHA. DELTA. AGENT, YOU HAVE BEEN ACTIVATED."[/italic][/color]
Traitors are antagonists employed by the [color=#ff0000]Syndicate[/color]. You are a sleeper agent who has access to various tools and weapons through your [bold]uplink[/bold]. You also receive [color=red]codewords[/color] to identify other agents, and a coordinated team of Traitors can have [italic]brutal results.[/italic]
Anyone besides [textlink="department heads" link="Command"] or members of [textlink="Security" link="Security"] can be a Traitor.
## Uplink The [color=cyan]uplink[/color] is your most important tool as a Traitor. You can exchange [color=red]telecrystals[/color] (TC) for items that will help you with your objectives. 20 [color=red]telecrystals[/color] are given to each Traitor to spend or to share.
By pressing [color=yellow][bold][keybind="OpenCharacterMenu"][/bold][/color], you'll see your personal uplink code. [bold]Setting your PDA's ringtone as this code will open the uplink.[/bold]
[bold]Make sure to close your uplink to prevent anyone else from seeing it.[/bold] You don't want [color=#cb0000]Security[/color] to get their hands on this premium selection of contraband!
## Objectives As a Traitor you'll have a list of [bold]objectives[/bold], which you can read by pressing [color=yellow][bold][keybind="OpenCharacterMenu"][/bold][/color].
Using your [bold]uplink[/bold] will help you with most of these tasks. Your possible objectives are:
- Kill or maroon (leave behind) a randomly selected person. - Kill a randomly selected department head. - Keep a randomly selected traitor alive. - Help a randomly selected traitor finish half of their objectives. - Escape to Central Command alive and unrestrained. - Die a glorious death. - Steal the [color=yellow]Captain[/color]'s [bold]ID Card[/bold], [bold]antique laser pistol[/bold], [bold]jetpack[/bold], or [bold]nuclear authentication disk[/bold].
- Steal the [color=#5b97bc]Chief Medical Officer[/color]'s [bold]hypospray[/bold] or [bold]handheld crew monitor[/bold].
- Steal the [color=#c96dbf]Research Director[/color]'s [bold]experimental hardsuit[/bold] or [bold]hand teleporter[/bold].
- Steal the [color=#cb0000]Head of Security[/color]'s [bold]secret documents[/bold].
- Steal the [color=#f39f27]Chief Engineer[/color]'s [bold]advanced magboots[/bold].
- Steal the [color=#b18644]Quartermaster[/color]'s [bold]requisition digi-board[/bold].
- Butcher Ian, the [color=#9fed58]Head of Personnel[/color]'s dog, and obtain the [bold]corgi meat[/bold].
